mapper.insert: insert into role_routine_grants (grantor, grantee, specific_catalog, specific_schema, `specific_name`, `routine_catalog`, `routine_schema`, `routine_name`, privilege_type, is_grantable) values (#{grantor,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{grantee,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{specificCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{specificSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{specificName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{routineCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{routineSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{routineName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{privilegeType,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{isGrantable,jdbcType=DISTINCT})
mapper.select: select grantor, grantee, specific_catalog, specific_schema, `specific_name`, `routine_catalog`, `routine_schema`, `routine_name`, privilege_type, is_grantable from role_routine_grants
